turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could I get a drink from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, which Starbucks? The one in Target, or the one on Route 29 in Wilton?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be going through Wilton, so the one on 29.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so the Wilton store. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll get a Cinnamon Dolce Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'll do Grande this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Do you want it straight, or with milk in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take milk in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have rice milk yet?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, not yet. Would you like almond milk or coconut milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'll go with coconut milk again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, do you want any sugar in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not sugar, only Splenda, two packets.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, just Splenda. Do you want whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not this time. It would defeat the point of coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I've got it. Anything else to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get extra cinnamon on top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think so. I'll write that down too.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you. When should I pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready at the Wilton store on Route 29 in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye.
